entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10.

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 70 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
